Review Content: There is both a powerful character study and genuinely funny exaggeration of an established genre within the feature, but the final voice feels torn between these two identities instead of bringing them together into one confident film.
Name: Carson Timar

Review Content: A delightful spoonful of telenovela goodness.
Name: Ricardo Gallegos

Review Content: An enjoyable satirical romp for those in the mood for something on the sillier side
Name: Courtney Small

Review Content: Hayop Ka! is this unusual yet entertaining animated film driven by a sexual frenzy with an insatiable appetite. The film is a romantic smorgasbord of lust with a final act that is smashed between a triple cheeseburger of twists.
Name: Chris Sawin

Review Content: Thanks to delightful animation design and charming voice work, we know immediately that this is supposed to be silly, slightly naughty fun, not something smutty or salacious.
Name: Mike McGranaghan

Review Content: You Animal! (Hayop Ka!) offers a boisterous swirl of sass, sex and soap opera hysterics.
Name: Allan Hunter

Review Content: Hayop Ka! is mostly bark, and barely any bites.
Name: Oggs Cruz
